languages.text: "Мне вот интересно, булыжник, а как твой Лекс смотрит на ситуацию с Лорд-капитаном? Что, силенок не хватит судить Вольного Торговца?"
languages.translation_comment: Loyalist companions have left the heretic RT's retinue.

languages.text: "Here's what I'm wondering, Master Killjoy: how does your Lex view the current situation with the Lord Captain? Can't judge a Rogue Trader, can you?"
languages.translation_comment: Loyalist companions have left the heretic RT's retinue.
languages.original_text: "Мне вот интересно, булыжник, а как твой Лекс смотрит на ситуацию с Лорд-капитаном? Что, силенок не хватит судить Вольного Торговца?"

traits.locale_text: "Here's what I'm wondering, Master Killjoy: how does your Lex see the situation with the Lord Captain? Can't judge a Rogue Trader, can you?"

"Here's what I'm wondering, Master Killjoy: how does your Lex view the current situation with the Lord Captain? Can't judge a Rogue Trader, can you?"

languages.text: 「さて、気になるところなんだけどね、堅物マスター。あなたのレックスは、今のロード・キャプテンの状態をどう見てる？ローグトレーダーを裁くなんて、あなたには無理なんじゃない？」
languages.original_text: "Here's what I'm wondering, Master Killjoy: how does your Lex view the current situation with the Lord Captain? Can't judge a Rogue Trader, can you?"

traits.locale_text: 「さて、気になるところなんだけどね、堅物マスター。あなたのレックスは、今のロード・キャプテンの状態をどう見てる？ローグトレーダーを裁くなんて、あなたには無理なんじゃない？」

languages.text: "Ich frage mich Folgendes, Meister Spielverderber: Wie sieht Euer Lex die aktuelle Situation mit dem Lord Captain? {mf|Einen Freihändler|Eine Freihändlerin} könnt Ihr nicht verurteilen, oder?"
languages.original_text: "Here's what I'm wondering, Master Killjoy: how does your Lex view the current situation with the Lord Captain? Can't judge a Rogue Trader, can you?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich frage mich Folgendes, Meister Spielverderber: Wie sieht Euer Lex die aktuelle Situation mit dem Lord Captain? {mf|Einen Freihändler|Eine Freihändlerin} könnt Ihr nicht verurteilen, oder?"

languages.text: «Me pregunto una cosa, maestro aguafiestas: ¿qué dice la Lex sobre la situación de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán? No puede juzgar a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "Here's what I'm wondering, Master Killjoy: how does your Lex view the current situation with the Lord Captain? Can't judge a Rogue Trader, can you?"

traits.locale_text: «Me pregunto una cosa, maestro aguafiestas: ¿qué dice la Lex sobre la situación de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán? No puede juzgar a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: “有件事情我很好奇，泼冷水大师。从帝国法典的角度来看，你如何看待舰长大人目前的情况？噢，你无权评判行商浪人，对吧？”
languages.original_text: "Here's what I'm wondering, Master Killjoy: how does your Lex view the current situation with the Lord Captain? Can't judge a Rogue Trader, can you?"

traits.locale_text: “有件事情我很好奇，泼冷水大师。从帝国法典的角度来看，你如何看待舰长大人目前的情况？噢，你无权评判行商浪人，对吧？”

languages.text: "Merak ettiğim şey şu ki Oyunbozan Efendi... Senin şu Lex'in, Lord Kaptan'la ilgili mevcut durum hakkında ne diyor? Bir Hür Tacir'i yargılayamazsın ne de olsa, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Here's what I'm wondering, Master Killjoy: how does your Lex view the current situation with the Lord Captain? Can't judge a Rogue Trader, can you?"

traits.locale_text: "Merak ettiğim şey şu, Oyunbozan Efendi... Senin şu Lex'in, Lord Kaptan'la ilgili mevcut durum hakkında ne diyor? Bir Hür Tacir'i yargılayamazsın ne de olsa, değil mi?"

languages.original_text: "Here's what I'm wondering, Master Killjoy: how does your Lex view the current situation with the Lord Captain? Can't judge a Rogue Trader, can you?"

languages.text: « Éclairez ma lanterne, maître Rabat-joie : comment votre Lex appréhende-t-elle la situation actuelle {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ? Vous ne pouvez tout de même pas juger {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "Here's what I'm wondering, Master Killjoy: how does your Lex view the current situation with the Lord Captain? Can't judge a Rogue Trader, can you?"

traits.locale_text: « Éclairez ma lanterne, maître Rabat-joie : comment votre Lex appréhende-t-elle la situation actuelle {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ? Vous ne pouvez tout de même pas juger {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, n'est-ce pas ? »
